workout_file.author: COACH
workout_file.name: Week 1-Sunday-Active Recovery-60
workout_file.description: Total duration: 60 minutes. Active Recovery session to promote blood flow and aid muscle repair after yesterday's hard effort. Based on FTP of 228W.

textevent.message: Let's begin the 7-minute warm-up ramp from 85W to 160W.
Get ready for the 3 activation intervals.
Main set: 47 minutes of steady Active Recovery at 115W.
Keep the cadence light and focus on smooth pedal strokes.
Just over 20 minutes in. Effort should feel very light.
About 7 minutes left of this recovery block.
Main set complete. Get ready for the cool-down.
Great recovery ride. Monday is a full rest day.
